Text: PGE Texas Pipeline Cc PGE will probably try to bill us for parking a volume of for August and at Mmbtu each day Please do not pay this charge when we receive this invoice PGE was unable to make deliveries into El Paso because of high sulfur content in their gas and is trying to charge us with a parking charge for gas that they could not deliver Please let me know if you need any additional information Thanks

will be in Dallas meeting with Tufco the same afternoon I told them before they scheduled this meeting that I would not be able to attend Just a reminder for you Thanks Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on PM From Esther Buckley PM To Gary A CT Earl CT Daren J CT Stacey CT Danny nron Lauri A CT Edward D CT Elsa CT cc Laura nron Subject James McKay has requested a meeting to review the Texas DeskGas Control Morning Report Please mark you calendars to attend this meeting on Wednesday July from PMPM The meeting will be held in EBC If you have any questions please feel free to call me at Thanks Esther Buckley

Eastrans Nomination Gas Day Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From William E Speckels PM To cc Michael R Cherry Chad W Cass Julia A Urbanek John A Bretz Bruce McMills Subject Eastrans Nomination Gas Day This is to nominate mmbtud into Eastrans for GD forward Redeliveries will be made as follows into PGE Valero to HPL CW from Fuels Cotton Valley If you have any questions give me a call at Thanks William

Communicating Effectively course offeringThere is an effective communication course on December Thursday from pm Is this the one you suggested for me and if it is may I attend this one Please let me know It is listed through Ernie and is Thanks for looking into this

my performance evaluation choices Gary Hanks pipeline operations Morgan Sharifi desk to desk business Greg Steagall transportationinvoicing Julie Meyers contract admin Charlotte Hawkins HPLC ops Please let me know if you think I should list anyone else Thanks

Re IC variance for deal this one Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on AM From Charlotte Hawkins on AM To Stacey CT Sherlyn CT cc Robert E CT Howard B CT Carlos J CT Subject Re IC variance for deal Okay this one has been resolved the deals for days and are good Sitara did not feed this deal to MOPS at all therefore it didnt feed to POPS Sherlyn is setting things up and will provide me with a tracking ID I will enter volumes and reallocate the meter Very confusing but finally resolved CHawkins From Charlotte Hawkins AM To Stacey CT cc Robert E CT Howard B CT Subject Re IC variance for deal Stacey Sherlyn needs answers I dropped the ball and sent this to Carlos sorry Let me know if i can help Charlotte From Sherlyn Schumack AM To Charlotte CT cc Subject IC variance for deal Charlotte There is an interconnect variance at meter for It appears the variance is created on and There is a transport usage deal ticket in Sitara which shows PGE delivers mmbtu to HPL on and mmbtu on but HPL does not show a receipt of this volume Let me know if you need the PGE support

Re IC variance for deal you please look into this for me Thanks Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on PM From Charlotte Hawkins AM To Stacey CT cc Robert E CT Howard B CT Subject Re IC variance for deal Stacey Sherlyn needs answers I dropped the ball and sent this to Carlos sorry Let me know if i can help Charlotte From Sherlyn Schumack AM To Charlotte CT cc Subject IC variance for deal Charlotte There is an interconnect variance at meter for It appears the variance is created on and There is a transport usage deal ticket in Sitara which shows PGE delivers mmbtu to HPL on and mmbtu on but HPL does not show a receipt of this volume Let me know if you need the PGE support

Enron Scheduled VolumesMay thru Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Ibrom Lorraine AM To Stacey Neuweiler Stacey nroncom cc Subject Enron Scheduled VolumesMay thru Following is scheduled volumes on El Paso under Enrons K Date Package Volume Delivered to Teco EX JZ EX JZ EX JZ PGE Gas Transmission Texas and any other company referenced herein which uses the PGE name or logo are not the same company as Pacific Gas and Electric Company the California utility These companies are not regulated by the California Public Utilities Commission and customers do not have to buy products from these companies in order to continue to receive quality regulated services from the utility

Change name on pipeline Contract No Teco Global Contract No Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on AM Marlene Hilliard AM To Stacey CT Rita CT Sylvia A CT Julie CT cc Subject Change name on pipeline Contract No Teco Global Contract No Please be advised that Contract No Teco shows in the Global Contract system as PGE Texas Pipeline LP however the pipeline name should be PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc Apparently the pipeline name was entered into the global system incorrectly I have confirmed this with Charles Berner in the Contracts Administration section and Kim Watson both with PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc The contract name should be PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc I would like to change the pipeline to reflect the correct pipeline name effective April Thus it will not affect the previous noms for this contract All please respond to let me know if this will cause problems with replication or anything else with the system Julie and Stacey Deal No is attached to this contract you may need to change this in your system Marlene Hilliard

LOOK AT THISITS IMPORTANTHopefully this got your attention I just wanted to confirm my vacation days with you I have April and May and August Please let me know if these are the same as on your calendar Thanks
Transport contractsThe Oasis contract s are PGE contract s are PGE parking and lending contracts awaiting approval PLE PLA

FW Whose NeedsPERFECT Proprietary A husband and wife are getting all snugly in bed The passion is heating up But then the wife stops and says I dont feel like it I just want you to hold me The husband says WHAT The wife explains that he must not be in tune with her emotional needs as a Woman The husband realizes that nothing is going to happen tonight and he might as well deal with it So the next day the husband takes her shopping at a big department store He walks around and has her try on three very expensive outfits She cant decide He tells his wife to take all three of them Then they go over and get matching shoes worth each And then they go to the Jewelry Dept where she gets a set of diamond ear rings The wife is so excited She thinks her husband has flipped outbut she does not care She goes for the tennis bracelet The husband says but you dont even play tennis but OK if you like it then lets get it The wife is jumping up and down so excited she cannot even believe what is going on She says I am ready to go lets go to the cash register The husband stops and says No honey I dont feel like buying all this stuff now The wifes face goes blank He says Honey I just want you to HOLD this stuff for a while The look on her face is indescribable and she is about to explode and the husband says You must not be in tune with my financial needs as a Man

FW quipsRemember amateurs built the ark Professionals built the Titanic Conscience is what hurts when everything else feels so good Talk is cheap because supply exceeds demand Stupidity got us into this mess why cant it get us out Love is grand divorce is a hundred grand Even if you are on the right track youll get run over if you just sit there Politicians and diapers have one thing in common They should both be changed regularly and for the same reason An optimist thinks that this is the best possible world A pessimist fears that this is true There is always death and taxes however death doesnt get worse every year People will accept your ideas much more readily if you tell them that Benjamin Franklin said it first Its easier to fight for ones principles than to live up to them I dont mind going nowhere as long as its an interesting path Anything free is worth what you pay for it Indecision is the key to flexibility It hurts to be on the cutting edge If it aint broke fix it till it is I dont get even I get odder In just two days tomorrow will be yesterday I always wanted to be a procrastinator never got around to it Dijon vu the same mustard as before I am a nutritional overachiever My inferiority complex is not as good as yours I am having an out of money experience I plan on living forever So far so good I am in shape Round is a shape Not afraid of heights afraid of widths Practice safe eating always use condiments A day without sunshine is like night I have kleptomania but when it gets bad I take something for it If marriage were outlawed only outlaws would have inlaws I am not a perfectionist My parents were though Life is an endless struggle full of frustrations and challenges but eventually you find a hair stylist you like Youre getting old when you get the same sensation from a rocking chair that you once got from a roller coaster One of lifes mysteries is how a two pound box of candy can make a woman gain five pounds Its frustrating when you know all the answers but nobody bothers to ask you the questions The real art of conversation is not only to say the right thing at the right time but also to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment Time may be a great healer but its also a lousy beautician Brain cells come and brain cells go but fat cells live forever Age doesnt always bring wisdom sometimes age comes alone Life not only begins at forty it begins to show You dont stop laughing because you grow old you grow old because you stopped laughing atthtm
please note my new email addresstoday please send future correspondence to me at Thanks

Change name on pipeline Contract No Teco Global Contract No Forwarded by Stacey NeuweilerHOUECT on AM Marlene Hilliard AM To Stacey CT Rita CT Sylvia A CT Julie CT cc Subject Change name on pipeline Contract No Teco Global Contract No Please be advised that Contract No Teco shows in the Global Contract system as PGE Texas Pipeline LP however the pipeline name should be PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc Apparently the pipeline name was entered into the global system incorrectly I have confirmed this with Charles Berner in the Contracts Administration section and Kim Watson both with PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc The contract name should be PGE Gas Transmission Teco Inc I would like to change the pipeline to reflect the correct pipeline name effective April Thus it will not affect the previous noms for this contract All please respond to let me know if this will cause problems with replication or anything else with the system Julie and Stacey Deal No is attached to this contract you may need to change this in your system Marlene Hilliard
